inn1.comm: bowled em! What a terrific start for Zaheer, who pitches the ball up to Tharanga and seams the ball back in from around outside off stump, beats a loose forward push, and clips the top of middle
good ball again, pitched up to get some movement, and does get some, but Jayasuriya presses forward and plays the ball back watchfully
fuller length, marginally, and the movement draws an inside edge onto pad as Jayasuriya thrusts forward
now a short ball into the body, which Jayasuriya fends at and gets a glove on, and the ball rolls down into the gap at short fine leg
short of a length outside leg stump and Dilshan nudges it toward square leg to open his account
tempts him with a fullish ball outside off but Jayasuriya gets across and shoulders arms to leave well enough be
dropped! Oh no, whats Raina done? Nehra bowls it wide, drawing Dilshan into a firm slash to cover where Raina leaps up, gets hold of it, but spills it
hits a length, Dilshan drives hard down toward mid-off
slides down the pads, he walks across to try and glance but mistimes the ball off his pads to midwicket
too fine down the pads, no contact on the ball, and wide called
good length outside off stump and no shot offered
fuller ball, angles in and stays low, Jayasuriya covers off stump and again shoulders arms
good ball, back of a length and making him defend
hits a good length, straightens, Dilshan stands back and defends the ball into the off side, the single is called for, Raina runs in from cover but cannot collect well
hits a good length and Jayasuriya defends well
presses forward to a fuller ball and pokes at it, getting an inside edge
pitches short of a length and sits up to surprise Jayasuriya, who doesn't go for it as he hops back, the ball clips his elbow and flies past the slips for four ... yes, his elbow, and goes for runs
back of a length outside off and he leaves it be for Dhoni
ah! Ends the over by pitching it full and moving it away, Jayasuriya flashes and misses
hits a length on middle and off and straightens it and Dilshan defends
not much footwork as Dilshan flashes a fuller ball to point
back of a length, cracked into the off side, Raina runs to his right from cover and throws at the nonstriker's end as Dilshan runs off, but misses and Dilshan gets four runs for free
spits up from a length off a dicey patch and surprises Jayasuriya, who doesn't spot it and takes it high on the shoulder
now he overpitches outside off and Jayasuriya puts that away on the rise into the gap at extra cover
better delivery, on a length on off stump, pushed with a straight bat to mid-off and sets off but Dilshan waves him back as the fielder collects and releases

slides down the pads, Dilshan gets back and tries to pull, he gets cramped and the ball runs off his pads to short fine leg, he sets off and Dhoni collects the ball, then Dilshan slips but Dhoni misses the stumps ... boy its all happening today
again outside leg stump and he mistimes a big hit off the pads
lovely ball, pitches and goes on with the angle, and at a good height, to beat Dilshan as he pushes down the wrong line
shorter ball down the pads, Dilshan goes for a hook and misses as the ball deviates, Dhoni leaps across and pulls off a very good one-handed collection
aims for the blockhole and Dilshan digs the ball back to Zaheer
good ball, good length, pitches on off and straightens, Dilshan pushes at it and edges along the ground toward gully
pitches it on a length, Jayasuriya presses forward and pushes it nicely to Jadeja at mid-off
well bowled, on a length, some cut back in, Dilshan stands there and angles the bat down on the ball to chop it toward backward point
full outside leg stump, Dilshan heaves and misses, wide called
hits a tidy length on middle and off, straightens, sits up off a patch and Dilshan, pressing forward, does well to adjust and play it back with soft hands
gets tall and forces a shorter ball straight to backward point
pitches short and stays low as it angles across, Dilshan plays a hurried pull shot and manages to connect on the ball to play it to square leg
tentatively pushes a length ball to backward point, where Raina and Kohli have some miscommunication, so a single in the end for Jayasuriya
bangs it in and gets it to sit up from outside off stump, forcing Dilshan to hop back and push at the ball, but he removes the bottom hand and fends to the off
comes forward and pushes to cover
slants back in from outside off but he clips his wrists and works it out to deep backward square leg, where the debutant Tyagi fumbles and allows a second
pushes forward and plays away from the body, getting an inside edge to short fine leg
shapes back in from middle and off, Dilshan gets back and turns it
gets some lift off the track and that's what beats Dilshan, who flays at width and gets beaten on the angle
fuller ball just around off stump and he defends to cover
hops up and steers a short ball in the air wide of backward point
pitches outside leg, swings in, Dilshan again goes hard at the ball and cannot time it well at all
change of pace, angles across Dilshan who stops the shot as the ball skids past him and stays very low, not carrying well to Dhoni behind the stumps
bad ball, short and wide and he slaps it between cover and point, hit uppishly but he timed it well and hit it hard for his first boundary in 23 deliveries
pitches it up on middle and off and he defends watchfully
angles across off a length and gets some bounce but he plays it on top and dabs it down with soft hands wide of backward point
short of a length outside off, no movement, defended on the hop
pitched up, getting Jayasuriya to drive, he pushes it back to Zaheer's right, he gets a hand to take pace off the ball but allows a single
another heave to one pitching outside leg, and more mistiming, Jayasuriya starts off but retreats as short fine leg runs in to collect
back of a length, forcing Dilshan onto the back foot, then it stays low while jagging back, beats the bat and doesn't carry to Dhoni
fuller ball on the pads, flicked to square leg, sets off, Gambhir throws at the stumps but misses and Jayasuriya makes it home
wide down the pads off a shorter length
pitches leg and straightens, Jayasuriya plays it to midwicket
drifts down the pads and Dilshan plays a pick-up shot, safely wide of any fielder, and the ball drops just inside the ropes at deep backward square leg

he's hurt! The ball rears up from just back of a length and smacks Dilshan on the left arm, and despite wearing an arm guard he immediately reacts in pain, throwing the bat away toward square leg and dropping to his knees ... this pitch is a bad one, and something should now be said by the players .. that one jagged up off a patch and surprised him totally, he wasn't in position to play it and took it flush on the left forearm ... we will have a delay in play ... drinks come on for the players ... Nehra talks to Dilshan ... big huddle near the stumps as Dilshan gets treated
short of a length on the stumps and Dilshan gets in line nicely
fuller ball brings him onto the front foot defending to cover
gets back and hits a short ball but can't beat Kohli at backward point
goes to hook a short ball outside leg stump and gets a thick top-edge down toward third man where Harbhajan runs across in a hurry and does well to pull it back
shot and well stopped! Zaheer drops short, Dilshan pulls smack to square leg, making sure to roll the wrists, and Gambhir does really well to save four, getting his body in the ball's way
overpitched, he throws the bat at ball but can't beat cover-point
beats him with the length and angle as he flays away
good ball, pitches back of a length and holds its line to beat the bat

edged and gone, superb bowling! Having beaten the edge already this over, Zaheer brings his line fractionally closer to middle and off and shapes it away, making Dilshan play, and the angle draws a nick through to Dhoni
comes onto the front foot and defends to cover
pitches it up, the ball stays low and Jayasuriya shoulders arms
and again some variable bounce as he leaves be outside off

whoah, from toe to tip! After two low balls, this one pitches back of length, spits up and takes the shoulder of the bat as Jayasuriya presses it at it, there is some serious bounce if you find the spot
comes forward and tries to work it to third man but the bounce beats him
fuller ball, comes forward and pushes it to mid-off
goes full outside off and Sangakkara leaves it be
edged for four! Jayasuriya comes forward to a fullish ball, aiming to hit it on the rise over mid-off, but the movement draws a thick outside edge down to third man
slides down the pads off a shorter length
big appeal! This ball pitches back of a length, shapes in, stays low and hits the front foot as he presses forward, but the appeal is turned down because the impact was outside the line
lunges forward at a fuller one and defends with an inside edge
good length just outside off, he closes the face and defends to cover
shorter ball down the leg side, clips the pads, Dhoni collects
back of a length on the stumps and he defends
full outside off, he leans into a drive but cannot beat the man at cover
and again, laces a firm drive to cover where Raina dives and saves four
good length this time and Sangakkara is forced to defend
a bit too straight so he tucks it off his pads for a single
plays at a fullish ball without much footwork, looking to chop it fine, and gets an inside edge onto his boot
full and wide, Jayasuriya square-drives hard to backward point where there's a fumble due to the uneven bounce
oversteps, bowls it full outside off and Jayasuriya drives the ball into the gap at extra cover for four, and sets himself up for the free hit
bad ball, full toss outside off, Jayasuriya hangs on the back foot and smacks the ball between midwicket and mid-on
better delivery, back of a length outside off and he defends to cover
pitches on a good length and he defends down the track
change of pace, a bit fuller too, Jayasuriya turns it off his front pad into the gap at square leg and runs hard
bowls it on a length outside off stump to bring him on the front foot, pushing to cover
beaten! Lovely ball to end the over, pitches fuller to again commit Jayasuriya onto the front foot, but then it curls away from the bat and beats the outer edge
in the air and taken at cover! First wicket in ODIs for Tyagi, who pitches it up and gets Sangakkara chasing on the rise, he fails to keep the ball down and Raina catches
short of a length on middle and off, defended off the back foot, runs hard and gets one
pitches full and wide, stays low, very low, Jayasuriya flashes and misses and Dhoni does well to stop the ball, because it jumped up off the second bounce
similar line and this time he shoulders arms

another one rises from back of a length and surprises Jayasuriya and hits him on the knuckles, he winces in pain as he sets off for a single toward square leg, then goes back and calls for attention for his fingers
throws the bat at a full and wide ball and goes over cover, how many times have we seen this legend to that? This time its only a single, but the intent is there ... is it Sanath's day?
slowly tossed up and he pushes off the front foot to cover
ah, beauty! More air, lovely tossed up delivery, dips and hits the seam and beats the forward press
another good ball on middle and off, which is this time defended

he's a dead duck! Harbhajan makes no time in striking, bowling a flatter, quicker ball on off stump that goes on straight, the top spinner, which doesn't bounce and hits middle and leg as Jayasuriya gets the bat down too late
tosses it up on a length and he defends it back watchfully
slides in and he clips off it the stumps, well played
hits a length and he runs the ball toward backward point
goes back on one leg and opens the face, steering the ball to backward point where Kohli dives and parries it away toward third man
back of a length on middle and off, Samaraweera walks across and rolls the wrists to just knock the ball between midwicket and square leg
bowls this one short of a length on the stumps, Kandamby hops back into position to defend
change of pace and length, bowls it fuller and Kandamby blocks

terrible call for a run and Samaraweera goes! Good bowling, just back of a length, Kandamby goes back, opens the face and dabs the ball toward cover and sets off without looking at his partner, Samaraweera gets a late start and struggles to get down, Raina runs to his left from point, collects, and nails the sticks with a one-bounce direct hit
tossed up outside off, left alone
tossed up and defended
tossed up, goes back and defends
goes back and knocks the ball into the gap, runs hard
tossed up, eases forward and pushes the ball to extra cover
quicker ball down the pads, brushed away for a single
well bowled, short of a length outside off, angles across at a good height and he does well to run it down wide of gully
short of a length on the pads, runs it down for a single
short of a length on off stump, he stands tall and plays to point
fuller ball a foot outside off, tails back as he shoulders arms
pitches it up now and Pushpakumara drives toward extra cover
short ball angles down leg stump, Pushpakumara tries to play it fine off his hips but cannot get bat on ball

oh hell! Another corker from that patch, pitches back of a length and nearly knocks Pushpakumara's head off, he takes his eyes off it as the ball rears up toward his head, he ends up fending it down wide of slip
tossed up, the ball turns and bounces, Pushpakumara pushes at it and inside-edges past short leg
slower ball drifts down the pads, Kandamby turns the face and gets one
flatter ball pushed through quicker outside off, Pushpakumara plays a sweep and gets rapped on the pads outside the line and that ball did not turn either
beaten in the air by a slower one, he goes at it and misses
pitches on a length and Pushpakumara defends off the back foot
well bowled, much slower, Pushpakumara drives and inside-edges
short of a length on middle and  off and he defends
pitches fractionally outside leg and he goes back and across to glance it for a single
pushes a fuller ball straight to Kohli at backward point
full and wide, Pushpakumara tries to steer it fine but misses
down the pads for a wide
short of a length outside leg stump, he tries to get over the bounce and turn it for a single but ends up mistiming the shot off his pads
leans into a full ball and threads a drive between the covers
well bowled, slowly tossed up, gets some turn, pushed to cover
flatter ball, Pushpakumara sweeps against the turn from outside the line and plays it out to Tyagi at fine leg
slows the pace, holds it in the air a second longer, again gets some turn and Kandamby defends to the off side
tidy stuff, flighted on off stump and he stretches forward to defend
shot! Kandamby reaches out and hits against the turn, flat-batting it from outside off stump into the gap between midwicket and mid-on
flighted on middle and leg and he turns it toward mid-on
pitches outside leg and angles across the stumps at good height, Pushpakumara is forced to play at it and does well to edge along the ground to gully
now Tyagi bowls full and Pushpakumara rolls the wrists, flicking to midwicket
good ball! Short of a length, lovely height, he starts to feel for it off the toes and then somehow manages to hold back as the ball seams past his nose

sharper still, as this one flies up off the track past the batsman, hitting one of those treacherous patches, and Dhoni does really well to stop the ball with one hand, a wide is called for some reason
